item.title: Zhipu AI and Huawei Open-Source SOTA Multimodal Model Trained Entirely on Chinese Chips
item.description: Zhipu AI and Huawei have open-sourced GLM-Image, the first state-of-the-art multimodal model fully trained on Chinese chips, with image generation costing as little as USD 0.014 per call.

item.title: Baichuan AI Open-Sources World-Leading Medical AI Model M3
item.description: Baichuan AI has open-sourced its M3 medical AI model, which tops global benchmarks and outperforms GPT-5.2, as founder Wang Xiaochuan signals an IPO could follow once the product matures.

item.title: XPeng to Build Localized Supply Chain Teams in Europe and ASEAN as Overseas Expansion Accelerates
item.description: XPeng plans to form localized supply chain teams in Europe and ASEAN by 2026, accelerating its shift from vehicle exports to full-chain local production and operations overseas.

item.title: Viral Safety App “Are You Dead” Rebrands as Demumu, Embracing a Global Identity
item.description: China’s viral safety app Are You Dead, now rebranded as Demumu, is accelerating its global expansion after BBC coverage triggered a surge in overseas users.

item.title: Kuaishou Plans “QuanQuan” App as Didi Enters Home Services, Challenging 58.com’s Longtime Stronghold
item.description: Kuaishou and Didi are moving aggressively into home services and recruitment, intensifying competition in a trillion-yuan local services market long dominated by 58.com.
